providers.address: Headquarters 96 Laurel Hill Road, P.O. Box 937, Verona, VA 24482
providers.description: Blue Ridge Area Food Bank is a nonprofit organization that provides food assistance through a network of partner agencies, including food pantries, soup kitchens, shelters, and community programs. The organization distributes millions of pounds of food annually and operates mobile food pantries and direct distribution programs to serve individuals and families experiencing hunger across central and western Virginia.
providers.eligibility: Individuals and families experiencing food insecurity within the service area. Specific eligibility requirements may vary by partner pantry or distribution site.
providers.hours: Operating hours for all warehouses are 7:30 a.m. to 4 p.m. Monday through Friday.
providers.name: Blue Ridge Area Food Bank

providers.address:
219 East Davis Street 
Suite 300 
Culpeper, VA 22701
providers.description: Sam’s Place is a one-stop community outreach hub where individuals and families can access information, assistance, and referrals to a network of partner organizations. Services include help with basic needs such as health resources, transportation support, food access, home repair referrals, and applications for housing financial aid. The center also provides access to vision and hearing aids, clothing and furniture vouchers, and connects people with additional community partners based on individual needs and eligibility criteria.
providers.eligibility: Referrals are made based upon personal needs, available funds, and program criteria.
providers.name: Sam’s Place
